data.actual_result: App goes unresponsive for approx 10 seconds or a minute, depending on which message in the p.teknik.io link is used
data.short_description: Particular long messages cause Discord app to go unresponsive
data.steps_to_repro: - On desktop, directly paste one of the snippets in https://p.teknik.io/1B8Wp as a message - Access the channel you posted the message into, using Android app (you may need to wait a second or two for app to go unresponsive)
